templates_generators.label: Accordion
templates_generators.description: A template for working with fold-away content.

templates_generators.label: Accordion With Multiple Buttons
templates_generators.description: A template for working with fold-away content. There's a randomization button in each section.

templates_generators.label: Basic Template
templates_generators.description: Hello! This is your generator's description. If you want other people to find and use your generator, then you should try to explain your generator a bit, what it's for, and maybe why you made it. If you page doesn't have enough of an explanation it may not be listed by search engines like Google because they can't work out what your webpage is about.

templates_generators.label: Big Typography Template
templates_generators.description: Big Typography Template is a template that you can use to make generators that have a bold and impactful design.

templates_generators.label: Centered Minimal Example
templates_generators.description: Centered Minimal Example is a template that you can use to make generators that have a centered minimalistic design.

templates_generators.label: Centered With Background Template
templates_generators.description: Centered With Background Template is a template that you can use to make generators that have a centered design with a background.

templates_generators.label: Collection Template v1
templates_generators.description: You could use this template to showcase the generators that you've made, or just group together a collection of generators that you like.

templates_generators.label: Computer Terminal Template
templates_generators.description: Computer Terminal Template is a template that you can use to make generators that have a computer terminal-style design.

templates_generators.description: Dark Typography Template is a template that you can use to make generators that have a clean and minimalistic design.

templates_generators.label: Diary Example
templates_generators.description: Diary Example is a template that you can use to make generators that have a diary design.

templates_generators.label: Emoji Paragraph Template
templates_generators.description: Emoji Paragraph Template is a template that you can use to make generators that have an emoji paragraph design.

templates_generators.description: Hey there, this is the NES template. You can use it to make generators that have an old-school pixel-style theme.

templates_generators.label: Origin of Species Template
templates_generators.description: Origin of Species Template is a template that you can use to make generators that have a design inspired by the Origin of Species.

templates_generators.label: Stat Block 5e Generator Template
templates_generators.description: To use this template, simply click the edit button, make some changes to the card properties (add your own randomness), and then click save. You can also change the styling of the card by editing the CSS in the template.
